intent.user_query: What is the average sale amount per customer, and how many sales did each customer make?

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT c.CustomerID, AVG(s.TotalAmount) AS AverageSaleAmount, COUNT(s.SaleID) AS NumberOfSales FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID GROUP BY c.CustomerID ORDER BY AverageSaleAmount DESC;

arguments.sql: SELECT c.CustomerID, AVG(s.TotalAmount) AS AverageSaleAmount, COUNT(s.SaleID) AS NumberOfSales FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID GROUP BY c.CustomerID ORDER BY AverageSaleAmount DESC;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
